title: Not getting honor rewards?
body: So I got to **Honor 5** and all I get, even though I am playing frequently, is mb 1 key fragment **once a week** mb less and Honor capsule **once a month** if much. My friends are having the same issues. It kinda sucks being stuck with 10+ chests and 0 keys to open them.

replies.body: There IS a counter in your profile on how many chests you can still get and it maxes out at 4 and regenerates 1 per week, so you can get 4 chests and 4 keys per month if you manage to max everything out, so it evens out.
I know there is chest counter but nothing about keys and how to keep an eye on them.

I took a look at your account, but wasn't able to find anything out of the ordinary here.  Honor capsules are random, so there could be a period where it just seems barren.  They also subtitle would would be a key fragment drop, so if you already reached your 12 per ~28 days then you won't be able to get more until your drop rate refreshes.  

Our [Honor guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148)should have more info on that as well, though, I hope that helps clear things up!
And if there is a limit on key fragments are you planning to put some counter like there is one for chests? I think it would be good to see if how many we can still get.
Didn't know there was any limit for getting key fragments though. That explains a lot. I'll try to keep an eye on that. Anyway thanks for your help!
